page.title: 16Clubs in the Felton Area
page.content: Most club activities are held in the village halls. Burley Gate has the old primary school. There are regular meetings of the Playgroup, the Youth Club, the Womens' Institute, Mother and Toddler's Club, Cubs, and Sunday School. There is a football pitch in Burley Gate and one in Preston Wynne. In Felton, the Crozen Public House has a darts team and also a cards team. Preston Wynne's hall is of corrugated iron construction. Regular meetings take place of Brownies, Girl Guides and Womens' Institute. The Health Authority's Baby Clinic is held here once a month.
